data.title: All God's Children (2023)
data.meta_description: All God's Children: Directed by Robert Lemelson, Chisako Yokoyama. Idris is a nonverbal autistic boy living in rural Java who struggles to communicate and connect with others in his village. He is supported by grassroots disability awareness movements and local cultural models of inclusion.
